PHRASE.LANG: Built of high impact petroleum based plastics and composites, CAS fuel Tanks are a MUST HAVE for all CAS units. How else are you going to store fuel for your CAS armor suit? You'll find that these fuel tanks stack well on each other as well as perfectly fit on CAS-Scaffolding. [#Legal]

Fabriqués en plastique et composites pétroliers ultra résistants, les réservoirs du CAS sont l'accessoire indispensable de toutes les unités du CAS. C'est la seule façon pour eux de stocker le carburant de leur armure! Ces réservoirs peuvent s'empiler facilement et trouveront leur place sur l'échafaudage du CAS. [#Legal]

Built of high impact petroleum based plastics and composites, CAS fuel Tanks are a MUST HAVE for all CAS units. How else are you going to store fuel for your CAS armor suit? You'll find that these fuel tanks stack well on each other as well as perfectly fit on CAS-Scaffolding. [#Legal]
